title: Designing Higher Education Distance Learning Programs: An Evidence-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic pedagogical knowledge and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing remote program design capabilities in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more instructional strategies reflecting psychological factors (motivation, cognitive load management) when designing distance education.
Learners can analyze and apply technical requirements (compatibility, accessibility) necessary for designing web-based learning environments.
Learners can specify language education content design plans considering cultural contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
